name: Amit Sharma
feedback: I've been consistently working overtime without any extra compensation. Deadlines keep changing, unrealistic, and no recognition. Career growth? Not happening.

feedback.summary: Work is engaging, but internal politics make things difficult.
feedback.detailed: I like the projects, but some folks get special treatment. I put in work, numbers look great, but promotions are slow. Doesn't feel fair.

name: Rajesh Verma
feedback: But customers can be too much sometimes.
Policies change all the time. Hard to keep up.
Salary not increasing. Don't know if I wanna stay long.

transcript.speaker: Employee
transcript.text: No recognition. No flexibility. Better offer elsewhere.

transcript.speaker: HR
transcript.text: Did you discuss this with your manager?

name: Vikram Choudhary
feedback: Yeah, job is fine. Not much to say. Some days better than others. Remote work would be nice.

specific: Workload has increased but team size remains same.

name: Anil Gupta
feedback: Company town hall was just management talking. No real changes.

feedback.email_complaint: Sent an email to HR last month about unfair commissions. No response yet. Not the first time.
feedback.verbal: Told my manager. He just shrugged.

feedback.meeting_summary: Discussed workload concerns. Manager acknowledged but no action taken. Frustration growing.

name: Ritika Sen
feedback: Been here a long time. Culture has changed. Feels less employee-friendly. Might start looking elsewhere.
